# [Interview #974: AMOL Signing Report - J. Dauro, Entry #71](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=974#71)

#### Question

Have you heard the rumors about Bela being the Creator?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I have indeed, and I find them very amusing.
